Reverse image search: A reverse image search was conducted to trace the origin of the photographs, leading to the discovery that they were from an album on the official Facebook page of a television show.
Investigation by a government advisor: Murtaza Wahab, an advisor on law and order for the provincial government in Sindh, investigated the viral photos and concluded that they were not a real kidnapping but part of a TV video shoot.
Confirmation from show anchor: Waseem Badami, an anchor at the television channel, confirmed on Twitter that the images were taken during an ongoing shoot outside the ARY office.
Marked as re: enactment: The footage from the TV show clearly indicated that the kidnapping scene was a re-enactment, as it was labeled and showed the actress playing the mother laughing and mentioning her microphone dropping.
